credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Project for a candelabrum
medium: Pen and ink, brush and wash, on paper.
description: A vase shape with two handles standing on a pedestal.  Two of the three intended arms are shown emerging from the vase.  Ram's heads are applied near their upper ends from which festoons hand toward spirals.  A pole which is decorated with flowers rises on top  Framing lines.
name: drawing
